dict.string:
This Schoolwork and ClassKit Debug Logging Profile generates files that allow Apple to troubleshoot issues with the Schoolwork app and help Apple to improve its products and services. The generated files may contain some of your personal information, including account information, activity within Schoolwork or related apps, network traffic, file names uploaded or downloaded, and progress tracking information. The profile will expire after 14 days.
You will be able to turn on and off logging at any time while the Profile is installed. To turn off logging on your iOS device, open Settings, tap General, tap "Profiles," tap "Schoolwork and ClassKit Diagnostics Profile," and tap "Delete Profile."
By enabling this diagnostic tool and sending a copy of the generated files to Apple, you are consenting to Apple use of the content of such files in accordance with its privacy policy (http://www.apple.com/legal/privacy).
Apple Confidential Profile. Do not distribute. Not to be used or disclosed without permission from Apple. Copyright © 2024, Apple Inc. All rights reserved.
Enables Schoolwork and ClassKit debug logging
